name: Gagaku
description:
Protect the heart, kill the enemy. One shot every 10 second.

Which is not a lot. Hopefully, you will be able to use various construction in order to maximize the effectiveness of this shot.

Try to survive for 9 minutes, and don't forget to play the tutorial.

(Special note: this game make use of the middle button of the mouse, use the fullscreen to use it efficiently)

Graphics: Pozi (@pozi.art / @caroline_pozzo_di_borgo) , BarravelBZH

Audio: lsdlx

Code: tatawanda , LoicLeGrosFrere

Jam D+1: added a freestyle mode to fully enjoy the fact of creating infinite loop

Jam D+2: added a text saying you can rotate building by scrolling
